_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The ten things that hinder the ten likab: Sloth and lack of initiative hinder wealth
Lack of adornment and decoration hinder beauty
Lack of sense restraint hinders the spiritual life
Not wanting to listen and ask questions hinders wisdom
Lack of commitment and reviewing hinder good qualities
The ten things that nourish the ten lika: Sense restraint nourishes the spiritual life
Eagerness to listen and ask questions nourishes wisdom
Commitment and reviewing nourish good qualities
